comment._content: The plant was located at 308 North Laurel Street. on the west side of Laurel between Grace and Broad.

comment.author: 15687789@N03
comment._content:
I  have an enlarged framed photo of a striped pussy cat resting below a Bell Telephone sign and to the top left inside of the photo I can make out a handle with writing on it..."Swift's Ice Cream."  So I decided to look up Swift Ice Cream...very cool!    
Teri Wilson

comment.author: 93851549@N07
comment._content:
We had a swift ice cream store in my home town of Chariton, Ia in the 40's and 50,s. It was the best ice cream on the market.
Lew

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/dmcgrann] Did they tear it down and build a Lums Restaurant there? That was a long time ago. I lived on the 300 Block of S. Laurel back then.
